title: Documentation v1.6.3.10-v7 Update
details:
Updated documentation from v1.6.3.10-v6 to v1.6.3.10-v7 with the following key features:

Key v7 Features (Reliability & Robustness):
1. Port Reconnection Circuit Breaker - State machine (DISCONNECTED/CONNECTING/CONNECTED/FAILED), 5 failure limit, 30s max backoff
2. Background Handshake Ready Signal - `isReadyForCommands`, command buffering, latency tracking
3. Adaptive Dedup Window - 2x observed latency (min 2s, max 10s)
4. Port Message Ordering - sequenceId tracking for critical messages
5. Handler Init Guards - All handlers use `_ensureInitialized()` consistently
6. Storage Event De-duplication - 200ms window, correlationId/timestamp versioning
7. quickTabHostInfo Cleanup - 5-min maintenance, max 500 entries
8. Container Validation - Adoption flow validates cookieStoreId before proceeding
9. Port Message Queueing - Queue messages during port disconnection (max 50)
10. Snapshot TTL Race Fix - Added `isRestoring` flag to prevent expiration during retry
11. Adaptive Port Viability Timeout - 2x p95 latency (min 700ms, max 3s)
12. Storage Write Serialization - Write queue with optimistic locking (max 3 retries)
13. Dependency Validation - `_ensureInitialized()` now checks `globalState.tabs` is ready
14. Adoption-Aware Ownership - Track recently-adopted Quick Tab IDs (5s TTL)

New Constants Added:
- MAX_CONSECUTIVE_FAILURES = 5
- CIRCUIT_BREAKER_BACKOFF_MAX_MS = 30000
- GRACE_PERIOD_MS = 5000
- ADAPTIVE_DEDUP_MIN_MS = 2000
- ADAPTIVE_DEDUP_MAX_MS = 10000
- MESSAGE_QUEUE_MAX_SIZE = 50
- STORAGE_DEDUP_WINDOW_MS = 200
- ADOPTED_QUICKTAB_TTL_MS = 5000
- HOST_INFO_MAX_ENTRIES = 500
- HOST_INFO_MAINTENANCE_INTERVAL_MS = 300000
- PORT_VIABILITY_MIN_TIMEOUT_MS = 700
- PORT_VIABILITY_MAX_TIMEOUT_MS = 3000
- STORAGE_WRITE_MAX_RETRIES = 3
